title: Workshop on Designing Integrated STEM Project-Based Learning for Elementary Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical concepts (geometry, measurement, data analysis) and fundamental knowledge of digital tool usage
context.additional_context: Focuses on strengthening STEM-integrated instructional design competencies applicable to real classroom environments

learning_goals: Learners can design STEM project proposals reflecting 4th Industrial Revolution core competencies using the ADDIE model
Learners can develop one or more integrated project scenarios combining mathematics, science, technology, and engineering
Learners can establish peer feedback systems using online collaboration tools
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
